page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT OF M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: In Market Weighton most of the people interviewed were retired, professional, skilled or semi-skilled. In Shiptonthorpe they were retired, professional or skilled. Unemployment is low. Out of 500 to 600 interviewed 8 were unemployed and 2 of these were school leavers. 60% travel to York or Hull for work. Many people have part time jobs in shops, schools, pubs and cafes. More women are working than l0 years ago. Two big firms, coachbuilding and agricultural machinery employ many and an icecream factory provides other jobs for local people.
